Package net.issachanzi.resteasy.model

Class BasicDao

java.lang.Object
net.issachanzi.resteasy.model.BasicDao
public class BasicDao extends Object
A data access object for a table representing an EasyModel class Each method performs a different database query

  • Constructor Details

    • BasicDao

      public BasicDao(Connection db, String tableName, Map<String,String> columnTypes)
      Constructs the DAO for a particular model's table
      Parameters:
      db - The database connection to use
      tableName - The name of the table to query
      columnTypes - A map containing a key of each column's name with a value of that column's SQL data type.

  • Method Details

    • createTable

      public void createTable() throws SQLException
      Executes a query to create the table specified by this model, if it does not already exist
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the underlying database query encounters an error

    • select

      public Collection<Map<String,Object>> select() throws SQLException
      Executes a query to select all rows from this DAO's table
      Returns:
      All rows in the table in a Collection. Each row is returned as a Map containing a key of each column name with the value of that column's value.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the underlying database query encounters an error

    • select

      public Map<String,Object> select(UUID id) throws SQLException
      Executes a query to select one row by its id column
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the column to select
      Returns:
      The selected row as a Map containing a key of each column name with the value of that column's value.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the underlying database query encounters an error

    • where

      public Collection<Map<String,Object>> where(Map<String,Object> filter) throws SQLException
      Executes a query to select rows from this table by the values of certain columns.

      Each specified column in the table must match the value in the filter param for a row to be returned.

      Parameters:
      filter - A map containing a key of the name of each column to filter on, with the value that must match for a row to be selected
      Returns:
      Selected rows in a Collection. Each row is returned as a Map containing a key of each column name with the value of that column's value.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the underlying database query encounters an error

    • where

      public Collection<Map<String,Object>> where(String whereSql, Object[] params) throws SQLException
      Executes a query to select rows from this table based on an arbitrary SQL WHERE clause

      Never interpolate user input or untrusted data of any kind into SQL queries (such as the whereSql param). Always use parameterised queries, which should be hard coded wherever possible.

      What is SQL injection - Cloudflare

      Parameters:
      whereSql - The SQL WHERE clause. ? characters can be used for parameter placeholders. This parameter must never contain untrusted data such as user input.
      Returns:
      Selected rows in a Collection. Each row is returned as a Map containing a key of each column name with the value of that column's value.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the underlying database query encounters an error

    • insert

      public void insert(Map<String,Object> values) throws SQLException
      Executes a query to add a row to this table
      Parameters:
      values - A map containing a key of each column's name with a value of the value to set for that column
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the underlying database query encounters an error

    • update

      public void update(UUID id, Map<String,Object> values) throws SQLException
      Executes a query to update a row in this table by its id column
      Parameters:
      id - The value of the id column for the row to update
      values - The values to update in the row, as a map with keys of column names with the value to be set in that column
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the underlying database query encounters an error

    • delete

      public void delete(UUID id) throws SQLException
      Executes a query to delete a row from this table by its id column
      Parameters:
      id - The value of the id column for the row to delete
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the underlying database query encounters an error
